name: FootRock 2
description: There are no rules and laws! We have abolished time, gravity and space. Challenge the ordinary reality in our crazy game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit) Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3200+ / Intel Pentium 4 3200+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard Sound Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 (64 bit), Windows 7 (32 & 64 bit), Windows Vista (32 & 64 bit) Processor: AMD Athlon II X2 255 / Intel Pentium E5500 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3850 / NVIDIA GeForce 6800 GT DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Onboard Sound Additional Notes: .net Framework 2.0 or higher
